title: Chicken Karaage
directions: Combine chicken thigh fillets, diced garlic, and grated ginger in a large bowl. Add soy sauce and mirin; mix well. Refrigerate, covered, for at least 1 hour.
Preheat vegetable oil in a deep pan. Place cornstarch in a bowl. Dredge chicken in cornstarch, just enough to coat each piece.
Fry until skin is golden brown and meat is cooked through.
ingredients: 1/2 kilo chicken thigh fillets, cut into small pieces
